package.name: Shopa_ShareAndEarn
package.summary: Adding shopa and its ‘share & earn’ tools to your retail site allows you to financially incentivize users to recommend your products to their networks and friends.
package.description:
With the addition of shopa’s ‘share & earn’ tools, users of retail sites can easily share product suggestions with friends and then split a commission reward from the retailer 50/50 with anyone who buys.
Financially incentivised users virally spread links to products they like to their personal networks, whilst online retailers benefit from additional sales through the recommendation of friends.
Retailers only pay commissions to their users on a success basis. Utilising a financially incentivised community to promote products on their behalf, this ‘no sale, no pay’ model allows retailers to reach as many people as possible as often and as cost effectively as possible.
